name: Aliens
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Ukonien Defense Commitee
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Kömmandant. We are the Ukonien Defense Commitee, created to ensure peace and prosperity for Ukoni and the rest of Nilia. We are a union of states in the Northeast of Ukoni. A parliamentary republic represented by iyr esteemed prime minister Mathilda Radler.
startIntroPart2: Kömmandant, will you bring prosperity for our union and our people? Will you create a spark to enlighten the world again? Will our committee shine through the ages of history like id did many years before? Only you can decide that. Our fate is in your paws, Kömmandant. The Committee will prevail!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: It is over. May the committee's legacy live on, and may Ukoni finally have peace...
introduction: Guten Tag. I am Mathilda Radler, representative of the Ukonien Defense Commitee. What can I do for you?
neutralLetsHeartIt: What can we do for you?
neutralYes: That's a great idea, we accept.
hateHello: Oh it's you again... Make it short.
tradeRequest: Guten Tag, we from the UDC think this trade would be beneficial for both of our nations.
